Content.Text:
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Welcome.
<PAGE>
I'm sorry, Hina isn't feeling all that
well. She's sleeping, actually.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
She never really gets sick, so this has
me quite surprised.
<PAGE>
Oh, this is no good. I'm totally out of
ingredients. I need to go and look for
Charles, too.
<PAGE>
Could you look after Hina for a while,
<MYNAME>? You just have to keep an eye
on her.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Uh...

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>? Where's my mom and dad?

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh... they're both out. Even though I'm
sick...

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
You're the only one here with me,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
No Mom, no Dad, no one else is here.

...Is that <MYNAME> and Hina? We're
coming in!

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Allen... and everyone! What's going on?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're here to see you, of course.
Camellia told us you were sick so we've
come to cheer you up.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was really worried to hear of you
being bedridden. Get well soon,
okay?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once you get better I'll show you my
latest magic trick, okay?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's a little something. You hold on
to it for her, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All of you... thanks. Thank you so much.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was really surprised to see you all.
I didn't think you'd come!
Hey, Hina! Are you awake?

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Toni, Niko. And Rebecca and Hossan too?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was so surprised to hear you're sick!
You were so full of energy yesterday.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hina, it looks like you're about to cry.
Are you in pain? Are you okay?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just rest up, little one. Rest and
you'll get better.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We all want to see you up and about
again as quickly as possible!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's a little something. You hold on
to it for her, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for coming. I'm so happy.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Mom and Dad still aren't home yet?
Everyone else came but my mom and dad
aren't here...
<PAGE>
Are they angry with me for getting sick?

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...You're sure?
Hina! Are you okay?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh Hina. You look so ill! Are you in
pain?
<PAGE>
You'll be okay now. I'm not going 
anywhere.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Dad. You took so long! I've been waiting
for you to come home.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, Hina. He almost fainted when
he heard that you were unwell.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dad...

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You must be hungry. I'll make some
broth for you.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay... thanks, Dad. Thanks, mom.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, thank you, too. My body is in
pain but my heart is full of energy.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you very much for today, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Having you at my side the whole time
made all the difference. I'm feeling
much better now!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>, for taking care of
Hina today. You have our grateful
thanks.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is all thanks to you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'll invite you over for a meal some 
time to thank you. Please come and eat 
with us.
